title: Game hunting in the Arctic Regions (D)
brief_description: A silent documentary film with English subtitles, about an arctic sea voyage and game hunting in the north of Norway, and around Spitzbergen and Bear Island. WARNING: CONTAINS IMAGES OF DYING ANIMALS, BUTCHERING CARCASES AND CAGING WHICH MAY DISTURB SOME VIEWERS.
